text: Auchenorrhyncha is a suborder of true bugs. It is also called the true hoppers. They include cicadas, planthoppers, spittlebugs, and other insects. == Infraorders == Auchenorrhyncha has only two infraordera: the Cicadomorpha (the cicadas, leafhoppers, treehoppers, and spittlebugs) and the Fulgoromorpha (the planthoppers). Category:Insects Category:Hemiptera
title: Auchenorrhyncha
